of code:

ted and doesn't work

s called "Code that is not

 thing as code that is not tested, but works. Or, that

cal existence, since you can't know such code exists,

even if only by using it.

 will let you know.

nd the reason behind

ant it, it's okay to write

r.

mpany will shut down.
